title: Mango farm agricultural farm land - drone footage 4K

tasks.task: Ride the tractor and operate the plow.
subtasks: Sit on the tractor seat.
Steer the steering wheel to direct the tractor.
Engage the plow mechanism.
Raise and lower the plow blades.
Navigate the tractor through the field.

tasks.task: Operate the tractor-mounted plow to till the soil.
subtasks: Position the plow at the desired depth.
Adjust the plow angle for proper soil disruption.
Start the tractor's engine.
Engage the transmission and move the tractor forward.
Monitor the plowed soil for evenness and proper texture.

tasks.task: Manage the soil preparation for planting.
subtasks: Ensure the soil is adequately tilled to remove weeds.
Check for any clumps or residue in the plowed area.
Assess the plowed soil's readiness for planting.

tasks.task: Drive the tractor with the plow to the next field.
subtasks: Transfer the tractor to the next field location.
Align the plow with the field boundaries.
Repeat the plowing process in the new field.

tasks.task: Check the plow's functionality during operation.
subtasks: Listen for any unusual noises from the plow.
Feel for vibrations indicating potential issues.
Stop the tractor to inspect the plow if problems are detected.
